original_title: Never Say Die: The Final Concert Film
overview: Waylon Jennings played his last major concert at Nashville's historic Ryman Auditorium in January 2000. Never Say Die: The Final Concert Film features that moving performance revisiting his greatest hitsâ€”done, as always, on his terms. Recorded on January 5-6, 2000.
title: Never Say Die: The Final Concert Film
